data.meaning: 味道, 气味, 嗅觉, 嗅, 臭味, 气息

app_sentences.en: I love the smell of flowers in the school garden in spring.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢春天学校花园里花的香味。

app_sentences.en: I can smell the fresh bread from the bakery next door.
app_sentences.cn: 我能闻到隔壁面包店新鲜面包的香味。

data.meaning: 胡瓜鱼

app_sentences.en: He smelt the flowers in the garden yesterday afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天下午他在花园里闻了那些花。

data.meaning: 软的, 温和的, 柔和的, 柔滑的, 温柔的, 软弱的, 坡度小的, 笨的, 纸币的

app_sentences.en: My new pillow is very soft and comfortable to sleep on.
app_sentences.cn: 我的新枕头非常柔软，睡在上面很舒服。

app_sentences.en: The new pillow is very soft and comfortable to sleep on.
app_sentences.cn: 新枕头非常柔软，睡在上面很舒服。

data.meaning: 酸的, 酸臭的, 发酵的, 愠怒的, 讨厌的, 拙劣的, 不健全的

app_sentences.en: The milk tastes sour, so we should not drink it.
app_sentences.cn: 这牛奶尝起来酸了，所以我们不应该喝它。

data.meaning: 饼干, 小甜点

app_sentences.en: My mother baked some delicious chocolate cookies for us.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈为我们烤了一些美味的巧克力饼干。

data.meaning: 毫米

app_sentences.en: Mm, this soup your mom made is really tasty!
app_sentences.cn: 嗯，你妈妈做的这个汤真好吃！

data.meaning: 比萨饼

app_sentences.en: We often order a large pizza to share on Friday nights.
app_sentences.cn: 我们经常在周五晚上点一个大披萨一起分享。

data.meaning: 可爱的, 有趣的

app_sentences.en: We had a lovely time at the park with our classmates.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在公园和同学们度过了愉快的时光。

data.meaning: 完成了的, 好了的

app_sentences.en: I have just done all my homework for the weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 我刚刚完成了周末的所有作业。

data.meaning: 尝试, 试验, 审理, 审判

app_sentences.en: You should try this new game; it is very interesting.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该试试这个新游戏，它非常有趣。

data.meaning: 尝试一下,试试看

app_sentences.en: I am not good at drawing, but I will have a try.
app_sentences.cn: 我不擅长画画，但我会试一试。

data.meaning: 馅饼, 财富, 总额, 贪污受贿, 杂乱, 喜鹊

app_sentences.en: My favourite dessert is apple pie with a little ice cream.
app_sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的甜点是配一点冰淇淋的苹果派。

app_sentences.en: My grandma makes the best apple pie in the world.
app_sentences.cn: 我奶奶做的苹果派是世界上最好的。

data.meaning: 声音, 语音, 吵闹, 声调, 听力范围, 探条, 海峡

app_sentences.en: The sound of the school bell tells us it is time for class.
app_sentences.cn: 学校铃声告诉我们上课时间到了。

app_sentences.en: The sound of rain helps me fall asleep quickly.
app_sentences.cn: 雨声帮助我快速入睡。

data.meaning: 喜好甜食

app_sentences.en: My little brother has a sweet tooth and loves candies.
app_sentences.cn: 我的弟弟爱吃甜食，喜欢糖果。

data.meaning: 盐, 风趣, 刺激

app_sentences.en: Too much salt in your food is not good for your health.
app_sentences.cn: 食物中盐太多对你的健康不好。

app_sentences.en: Please pass me the salt; I need some for my eggs.
app_sentences.cn: 请把盐递给我，我的鸡蛋需要加一点。

data.meaning: 果酱, 拥塞之物, 堵塞, 困境

app_sentences.en: I spread some strawberry jam on my toast every morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我每天早上都在吐司上涂一些草莓酱。

data.meaning: 眼镜；双筒望远镜；玻璃（glass的复数形式）

app_sentences.en: My sister wears glasses when she reads books.
app_sentences.cn: 我姐姐看书时会戴眼镜。

data.meaning: 工装裤, 牛仔裤

app_sentences.en: I usually wear jeans and a T-shirt to school.
app_sentences.cn: 我通常穿牛仔裤和T恤去上学。

data.meaning: 神经紧张的, 不安的, 神经的

app_sentences.en: She always feels nervous when she takes an important exam.
app_sentences.cn: 她参加重要考试时总是感到紧张。

app_sentences.en: She felt very nervous before her first piano competition.
app_sentences.cn: 在她第一次钢琴比赛前，她感到非常紧张。

data.meaning: 展览会, 市集, 美好的事物

app_sentences.en: Our teacher is always fair when she gives us marks.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的老师在给我们打分时总是很公平。

app_sentences.en: It's not fair that she got more candy than I did.
app_sentences.cn: 她得到的糖果比我多，这不公平。

data.meaning: 漂亮的, 优美的, 机灵的, 狡猾的, 恰当的

app_sentences.en: The garden looks pretty with all the colorful flowers.
app_sentences.cn: 花园里开满五颜六色的花，看起来很漂亮。

data.meaning: 骄傲的, 自大的, 自豪的, 辉煌的, 壮丽的

app_sentences.en: My parents are proud of me when I help others.
app_sentences.cn: 当我帮助别人时，我的父母为我感到骄傲。

app_sentences.en: My parents are proud of my good grades at school.
app_sentences.cn: 我的父母为我学校的好成绩感到骄傲。

data.meaning: 自豪, 高兴

app_sentences.en: You should be proud of yourself for finishing the race.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该为自己完成比赛而感到骄傲。

data.meaning: 陌生人, 门外汉

app_sentences.en: My mother told me never to talk to a stranger on the street.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈告诉我永远不要和街上的陌生人说话。

data.meaning: 消息, 通讯, 讯息, 教训, 预言, 广告词

app_sentences.en: I left a message on your phone about our meeting time.
app_sentences.cn: 我在你手机上留言了，是关于我们开会时间的。

data.meaning: 栈底, 标准二进制, 减, 备用设备

app_sentences.en: Can sb help me carry these heavy books to the classroom?
app_sentences.cn: 有人能帮我把这些沉重的书搬到教室吗？

data.meaning: 嗜好, 癖好, 爱好

app_sentences.en: My hobby is collecting stamps from different countries.
app_sentences.cn: 我的爱好是收集不同国家的邮票。

app_sentences.en: Reading is my favourite hobby in my free time.
app_sentences.cn: 阅读是我空闲时最喜欢的爱好。

data.meaning: 在学校, 在上课, 在求学

app_sentences.en: We learn many interesting subjects at school together.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在学校一起学习许多有趣的科目。

data.meaning: 标志, 分数, 马克, 痕迹, 斑点, 靶子, 刻度, 记号, 符号, 戳记, 标准, 起跑线

app_sentences.en: I hope to get a good mark on the English test tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望在明天的英语测验中取得好成绩。

data.meaning: 曾经, 究竟, 永远

app_sentences.en: Have you ever visited the Great Wall of China?
app_sentences.cn: 你曾经参观过中国的长城吗？

app_sentences.en: Have you ever visited the Science Museum in our city?
app_sentences.cn: 你曾经参观过我们市的科学博物馆吗？

data.meaning: 进入, 参加, 开始, 输入, 回车

app_sentences.en: Please knock on the door before you enter the teacher's office.
app_sentences.cn: 进入老师办公室前请先敲门。

data.meaning: 竞争, 竞赛

app_sentences.en: There is a drawing competition in our school next week.
app_sentences.cn: 下周我们学校有一场绘画比赛。

app_sentences.en: Our class won first place in the singing competition last week.
app_sentences.cn: 我们班在上周的歌唱比赛中赢得了第一名。

data.meaning: 奖赏, 奖金, 奖品, 战利品, 捕获

app_sentences.en: She received a special prize for her beautiful painting.
app_sentences.cn: 她因那幅美丽的画而获得了一个特别奖。

data.meaning: 一等奖, 头等奖

app_sentences.en: Winning the first prize made him very happy and excited.
app_sentences.cn: 赢得一等奖让他感到非常高兴和兴奋。

data.meaning: 梦, 空想, 愿望

app_sentences.en: My dream is to become a scientist and discover new things.
app_sentences.cn: 我的梦想是成为一名科学家，发现新事物。

app_sentences.en: My dream is to become a doctor and help sick people.
app_sentences.cn: 我的梦想是成为一名医生，帮助生病的人。

data.meaning: 的过去式和过去分词

app_sentences.en: Last night, I dreamed about flying over the mountains.
app_sentences.cn: 昨晚，我梦到飞越群山。

data.meaning: 的过去式和过去分词

app_sentences.en: She dreamt of traveling around the world when she was young.
app_sentences.cn: 她年轻时常梦想环游世界。

data.meaning: 写…的事, 写到…, 把（某事）作为写作的主题

app_sentences.en: For homework, we need to write about our summer holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 家庭作业要求我们写一写我们的暑假。

data.meaning: 只要...

app_sentences.en: You can borrow my bike as long as you return it before 5 pm.
app_sentences.cn: 只要你下午5点前归还，就可以借我的自行车。

data.meaning: 移动, 迁居, 步骤

app_sentences.en: My family will move to a new house next month.
app_sentences.cn: 我的家人下个月将搬到一个新房子。

data.meaning: 发送, 使进入, 寄, 派遣, 发射, 使陷于

app_sentences.en: I will send a postcard to my pen pal in Canada.
app_sentences.cn: 我将给我在加拿大的笔友寄一张明信片。

app_sentences.en: I will send an email to my pen pal in Canada tonight.
app_sentences.cn: 我今晚将给我在加拿大的笔友发一封电子邮件。

data.meaning: 德国

app_sentences.en: My uncle lives in Germany and works as an engineer.
app_sentences.cn: 我的叔叔住在德国，是一名工程师。

data.meaning: 法国

app_sentences.en: We learned about the Eiffel Tower in France in geography class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在地理课上学到了法国的埃菲尔铁塔。

data.meaning: 塔, 高楼, 堡垒

app_sentences.en: The clock tower in the city centre is over a hundred years old.
app_sentences.cn: 市中心的钟楼已有一百多年的历史。

data.meaning: 古代的, 古老的, 年老的, 旧的

app_sentences.en: We saw many ancient buildings on our trip to Xi'an.
app_sentences.cn: 我们去西安旅行时看到了许多古建筑。

app_sentences.en: We saw many ancient buildings during our trip to Beijing.
app_sentences.cn: 在我们去北京的旅行中，我们看到了许多古建筑。

data.meaning: 国王, 君主

app_sentences.en: The king in the story was very kind to his people.
app_sentences.cn: 故事中的国王对他的子民非常仁慈。

data.meaning: 王后, 女王

app_sentences.en: The queen in the story was very beautiful and wise.
app_sentences.cn: 故事里的王后非常美丽和聪明。

app_sentences.en: The young queen in the movie was both brave and wise.
app_sentences.cn: 电影中的年轻女王既勇敢又聪明。

data.meaning: 阿拉伯语

app_sentences.en: Arabic is a difficult but beautiful language to learn.
app_sentences.cn: 阿拉伯语是一门难学但优美的语言。

data.meaning: 混合物, 混乱, 糊涂

app_sentences.en: We mix flour, water and eggs to make noodles.
app_sentences.cn: 我们把面粉、水和鸡蛋混合起来做面条。

app_sentences.en: First, you need to mix the flour and eggs in a bowl.
app_sentences.cn: 首先，你需要把面粉和鸡蛋在碗里混合。

data.meaning: 失误, 避免, 失败, 小姐

app_sentences.en: I miss my primary school teachers and friends very much.
app_sentences.cn: 我非常想念我的小学老师和朋友们。

app_sentences.en: I miss my best friend because she moved to another city.
app_sentences.cn: 我想念我最好的朋友，因为她搬到了另一个城市。

app_sentences.en: I miss my old friends from my primary school.
app_sentences.cn: 我想念我小学时的老朋友。

data.meaning: 计算, 视为

app_sentences.en: Can you help me count the number of students in our class?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我数一下我们班的学生人数吗？

data.meaning: 倒读数, 用倒数方式计算

app_sentences.en: We started to count down from ten on New Year's Eve.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在除夕夜开始从十倒数。

data.meaning: 地球, 泥土, 世界, 尘世

app_sentences.en: The Earth goes around the Sun once every year.
app_sentences.cn: 地球每年绕太阳转一圈。

data.meaning: 新闻, 消息, 报导

app_sentences.en: My father reads the news in the newspaper every morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸每天早晨读报纸上的新闻。

app_sentences.en: My father watches the news on TV every evening after dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 我父亲每天晚上饭后看电视新闻。

data.meaning: 行星, 命运星辰, 杰出的人, 重大影响的事

app_sentences.en: Mars is a planet that is next to the Earth.
app_sentences.cn: 火星是紧挨着地球的一颗行星。

data.meaning: 伸出, 延伸, 区域, 范围, 流域, 岬

app_sentences.en: I cannot reach the top shelf because I am not tall enough.
app_sentences.cn: 我够不到顶层的架子，因为我不够高。

data.meaning: 还, 尚, 仍然, 已经, 然而

app_sentences.en: He has not finished his project for school yet.
app_sentences.cn: 他还没有完成他的学校项目。

data.meaning: 正直的, 合理的, 正确的, 应得的

app_sentences.en: I just finished my homework, so now I can watch TV.
app_sentences.cn: 我刚做完作业，所以现在可以看电视了。

app_sentences.en: I just finished reading an interesting book about space.
app_sentences.cn: 我刚读完一本关于太空的有趣的书。

data.meaning: 模型, 模范, 模特儿

app_sentences.en: My brother likes to build model planes in his room.
app_sentences.cn: 我的哥哥喜欢在他的房间里制作飞机模型。

data.meaning: 航天飞船

app_sentences.en: The spacecraft will send pictures back to scientists on Earth.
app_sentences.cn: 宇宙飞船将把图片发回给地球上的科学家。

data.meaning: 计划, 设计, 事业

app_sentences.en: For the science project, we grew some beans in a small pot.
app_sentences.cn: 对于科学项目，我们在一个小花盆里种了一些豆子。

app_sentences.en: Our science project this term is about the solar system.
app_sentences.cn: 我们这学期的科学项目是关于太阳系的。

data.meaning: 不麻烦; 没什么; 没事儿; 非常容易

app_sentences.en: 'Can you help me with this question?' 'Sure, no problem.'
app_sentences.cn: '你能帮我解答这个问题吗？''当然，没问题。'

data.meaning: 最近的

app_sentences.en: I want to buy the latest book by my favourite writer.
app_sentences.cn: 我想买我最喜欢的作家的最新著作。

data.meaning: 发现, 找到, 暴露

app_sentences.en: Scientists discover new things about our world every day.
app_sentences.cn: 科学家们每天都在发现关于我们世界的新事物。

app_sentences.en: Scientists hope to discover new planets in the future.
app_sentences.cn: 科学家们希望在未来发现新的行星。

data.meaning: 太空旅行者, 宇航员

app_sentences.en: The astronaut talked to students about life in space.
app_sentences.cn: 那位宇航员向学生们讲述了太空中的生活。

data.meaning: 宇宙航行,太空旅行

app_sentences.en: Space travel may become common for people in the future.
app_sentences.cn: 未来太空旅行对人们来说可能会变得普遍。

data.meaning: 一点也不, 毫不

app_sentences.en: None of the students in our class failed the English exam.
app_sentences.cn: 我们班没有一个学生英语考试不及格。

app_sentences.en: None of the students in my class failed the math test.
app_sentences.cn: 我们班上没有一个学生数学测验不及格。

data.meaning: 环境, 外界, 围绕

app_sentences.en: It is important to protect the environment for future generations.
app_sentences.cn: 为子孙后代保护环境非常重要。

data.meaning: 太阳的, 日光的, 源自太阳的

app_sentences.en: Solar power comes from the energy of the sun.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳能来自太阳的能量。

app_sentences.en: We learned about solar energy in our science lesson.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在科学课上学到了太阳能。

data.meaning: 系统, 体系, 制度, 方式, 秩序, 分类原则

app_sentences.en: Our school is testing a new computer system this month.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校这个月正在测试一个新的计算机系统。

data.meaning: 太阳系

app_sentences.en: We made a model of the solar system for our science project.
app_sentences.cn: 我们为科学项目制作了一个太阳系模型。

data.meaning: 团体, 组, 团, 群

app_sentences.en: We work in a group of four for our English class activity.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在英语课堂活动中四人一组进行合作。

data.meaning: 银河, 星系, 一群(显赫的人物)

app_sentences.en: Our Milky Way is just one galaxy among many in the universe.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的银河系只是宇宙中众多星系中的一个。

data.meaning: 宇宙, 星系, (思想等)范围

app_sentences.en: The universe is so large that we cannot imagine its size.
app_sentences.cn: 宇宙如此之大，我们无法想象它的大小。

data.meaning: 不可能的, 难以置信的, 令人无法忍受的

app_sentences.en: It is impossible to finish all this homework in one hour.
app_sentences.cn: 在一小时内完成所有这些家庭作业是不可能的。

data.meaning: 外面的, 熄灭的, 结束的

app_sentences.en: Please take out your English book and turn to page 25.
app_sentences.cn: 请拿出你的英语书，翻到第25页。

data.meaning: 显露, 传达, 感染

app_sentences.en: We can use the internet to communicate with people far away.
app_sentences.cn: 我们可以使用互联网与远方的人们交流。

data.meaning: 咳嗽

app_sentences.en: I have a bad cough, so my mother made me some honey tea.
app_sentences.cn: 我咳得厉害，所以我妈妈给我泡了些蜂蜜茶。

data.meaning: 发烧, 发热, 热病

app_sentences.en: You have a high fever and should stay in bed today.
app_sentences.cn: 你发高烧了，今天应该卧床休息。

data.meaning: 头痛, 令人头痛之事

app_sentences.en: I cannot play football because I have a terrible headache.
app_sentences.cn: 我不能踢足球，因为我头疼得厉害。

data.meaning: 胃, 食欲, 欲望, 肚子

app_sentences.en: My stomach feels full after eating that big bowl of noodles.
app_sentences.cn: 吃了那大碗面条后，我的胃感觉很饱。

app_sentences.en: Eating too much ice cream sometimes gives me a stomach ache.
app_sentences.cn: 吃太多冰淇淋有时会让我肚子疼。

data.meaning: 疼痛

app_sentences.en: My legs ache after running for an hour in PE class.
app_sentences.cn: 在体育课跑了一小时后，我的腿很疼。

data.meaning: 胃痛；肚子痛

app_sentences.en: She had a stomach ache after eating too much chocolate.
app_sentences.cn: 她吃了太多巧克力后肚子疼。

data.meaning: 牙痛

app_sentences.en: I need to see the dentist because I have a bad toothache.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要看牙医，因为我牙疼得厉害。

data.meaning: 自...以后, 自...以来

app_sentences.en: I have known my best friend since we were in primary school.
app_sentences.cn: 我从小学就认识我最好的朋友了。

data.meaning: (缩)连接词

app_sentences.en: We learned how to use 'because' as a conj in English class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在英语课上学了如何将'because'用作连词。

app_sentences.en: 'And', 'but', and 'or' are common conjunctions in English.
app_sentences.cn: '和'、'但是'和'或者'是英语中常见的连词。

data.meaning: 感冒, 寒冷

app_sentences.en: It's very cold outside, so remember to wear your warm coat.
app_sentences.cn: 外面很冷，所以记得穿上你的保暖外套。

app_sentences.en: It is very cold outside, so remember to wear your coat.
app_sentences.cn: 外面很冷，所以记得穿上你的外套。

data.meaning: 感冒

app_sentences.en: If you go out in the rain, you might catch a cold.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你冒雨出去，可能会感冒。

app_sentences.en: My dad will take me to the cinema this Saturday afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸这周六下午会带我去电影院。

data.meaning: 速食; 快餐

app_sentences.en: Eating too much fast food is not good for our health.
app_sentences.cn: 吃太多快餐对我们的健康不好。

data.meaning: 健康, 卫生, 蓬勃, 健康状态

app_sentences.en: Eating vegetables and fruits is good for our health.
app_sentences.cn: 吃蔬菜和水果对我们的健康有益。

app_sentences.en: Good health is more important than anything else in life.
app_sentences.cn: 良好的健康比生活中任何其他东西都重要。

data.meaning: 心, 心脏, 中心, 内心, 感情, 精神, 心情, 宝贝儿

app_sentences.en: My heart beats fast when I run in the PE class.
app_sentences.cn: 我在体育课上跑步时心跳得很快。

app_sentences.en: Running every morning is good for your heart and body.
app_sentences.cn: 每天早上跑步对你的心脏和身体都有好处。

data.meaning: 活跃的, 起作用的, 积极的, 有效的, 主动的, 活性的, 现行的, 现役的

app_sentences.en: My grandfather is very active and goes for a walk every day.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖父非常活跃，每天都去散步。

data.meaning: 宠物, 受宠爱的人, 宠坏的孩子, 不悦, 生气

app_sentences.en: My little pet dog always waits for me at the door.
app_sentences.cn: 我的小宠物狗总是在门口等我。

data.meaning: 成员, 会员

app_sentences.en: I am a member of the school reading club and we meet every week.
app_sentences.cn: 我是学校阅读俱乐部的成员，我们每周都见面。

app_sentences.en: Every member of our family helps with the housework.
app_sentences.cn: 我们家的每个成员都帮忙做家务。

data.meaning: 参加比赛

app_sentences.en: All students are welcome to take part in the school sports day.
app_sentences.cn: 欢迎所有学生参加学校运动会。

data.meaning: 情况, 条件

app_sentences.en: You must keep your books in good condition.
app_sentences.cn: 你必须保持你的书完好无损。

data.meaning: 情况特别好；处于极佳的状况；状态非常好

app_sentences.en: This old book is still in excellent condition after many years.
app_sentences.cn: 这本旧书历经多年仍然保存完好。

data.meaning: 困乏的, 欲睡的

app_sentences.en: I feel sleepy in class if I do not get enough sleep.
app_sentences.cn: 如果睡眠不足，我在上课时会感到困倦。

data.meaning: 每日的, 日常的

app_sentences.en: Doing some daily exercise is good for your health.
app_sentences.cn: 每天做一些运动对你的健康有好处。

app_sentences.en: Drinking milk daily helps children grow strong and healthy.
app_sentences.cn: 每天喝牛奶有助于孩子们长得强壮健康。

data.meaning: 不牢固的, 弱的, 虚弱的, 软弱的, 无力的, 无权力的, (论据等)不充分的

app_sentences.en: I was weak in maths, but now I am improving with more practice.
app_sentences.cn: 我过去数学很弱，但现在通过更多练习我正在进步。

app_sentences.en: After being ill, I still feel a bit weak and tired.
app_sentences.cn: 生病之后，我仍然感到有点虚弱和疲倦。

data.meaning: 疾病, 恶意

app_sentences.en: A good rest can help you recover from your illness quickly.
app_sentences.cn: 好好休息可以帮助你从疾病中快速康复。

data.meaning: 可怕的, 庄严的, 虔敬的

app_sentences.en: I had an awful headache yesterday and could not study.
app_sentences.cn: 我昨天头疼得厉害，无法学习。

data.meaning: 感觉难受；感觉很糟糕；感到痛苦的

app_sentences.en: She feels awful because she did not do well in the exam.
app_sentences.cn: 她感觉糟透了，因为她考试没考好。

data.meaning: 全部结束, 到处, 浑身

app_sentences.en: After playing football, I was dirty all over.
app_sentences.cn: 踢完足球后，我浑身都脏了。

data.meaning: 也许, 大概

app_sentences.en: Perhaps we can go to the library together after school.
app_sentences.cn: 也许放学后我们可以一起去图书馆。

data.meaning: 卡通画, 漫画

app_sentences.en: My favourite cartoon character is always brave and kind.
app_sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的卡通人物总是勇敢而善良。

data.meaning: 英俊的, 大方的, 慷慨的, 相当可观的, 美观的, 灵敏的

app_sentences.en: Many people think my elder brother is a handsome boy.
app_sentences.cn: 许多人认为我哥哥是个帅气的男孩。

app_sentences.en: Many people think the actor in the movie is very handsome.
app_sentences.cn: 许多人认为电影里的那位演员非常英俊。

data.meaning: 聪明的, 漂亮的, 刺痛的, 剧烈的, 敏捷的, 巧妙的, 伶俐的, 潇洒的

app_sentences.en: My sister is very smart and always gets good grades at school.
app_sentences.cn: 我妹妹很聪明，在学校总是取得好成绩。

app_sentences.en: She is a smart student and always gets good grades.
app_sentences.cn: 她是个聪明的学生，总是取得好成绩。

data.meaning: 天空, 天色, 天堂

app_sentences.en: At night, we can see many stars in the dark sky.
app_sentences.cn: 夜晚，我们能在黑暗的天空中看到许多星星。

app_sentences.en: The sky is clear and blue without any clouds today.
app_sentences.cn: 今天天空晴朗湛蓝，万里无云。

app_sentences.en: I like to look at the blue sky and white clouds.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢看蓝天和白云。

data.meaning: 打架, 争吵, 斗志

app_sentences.en: We should use words, not fists, to fight against unfair things.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该用言语，而不是拳头，来对抗不公平的事情。

app_sentences.en: The two heroes in the story fight against the evil monster.
app_sentences.cn: 故事中的两位英雄与邪恶的怪物战斗。

data.meaning: 英雄, 超越常人者, 男主角

app_sentences.en: The firefighter is a hero because he saves people from fires.
app_sentences.cn: 消防员是英雄，因为他从火灾中救人。

app_sentences.en: The firefighter is a true hero because he saves people's lives.
app_sentences.cn: 那位消防员是真正的英雄，因为他拯救人们的生命。

data.meaning: 富幽默感的, 滑稽的, 诙谐的

app_sentences.en: Our new English teacher is very humorous and makes us laugh.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的新英语老师非常幽默，常逗我们发笑。

data.meaning: 装罐

app_sentences.en: I can swim very well because I practice every summer.
app_sentences.cn: 我游泳游得很好，因为我每年夏天都练习。

data.meaning: 笑, 笑声

app_sentences.en: The funny story made the students laugh happily.
app_sentences.cn: 这个有趣的故事让学生们开心地笑了。

app_sentences.en: The funny movie made all of us laugh a lot.
app_sentences.cn: 那部有趣的电影让我们大家都笑得很开心。

data.meaning: 橘白相间的

app_sentences.en: I have an orange-and-white cat that is very friendly.
app_sentences.cn: 我有一只橘白相间的猫，非常友好。

data.meaning: adjust 调整；adjacent 相邻的；adjustable 可调整的；adjusted 调节过的

app_sentences.en: In the phrase 'a red apple', 'red' is an adjective.
app_sentences.cn: 在词组‘一个红苹果’中，‘红’是一个形容词。

app_sentences.en: 'Big' is an adj that we often use to describe size.
app_sentences.cn: 'Big'是一个我们常用来描述大小的形容词。

app_sentences.en: 'Big', 'happy', and 'green' are all adjectives.
app_sentences.cn: '大的'、'开心的'和'绿色的'都是形容词。

data.meaning: 丑陋的, 邪恶的, 险恶的, 不祥的

app_sentences.en: Some people think the building is ugly, but I like its design.
app_sentences.cn: 有些人认为这栋楼很丑，但我喜欢它的设计。

app_sentences.en: The kind princess soon won the heart of everyone in the kingdom.
app_sentences.cn: 善良的公主很快就赢得了王国里每个人的心。

data.meaning: 书包

app_sentences.en: My schoolbag is heavy because it has many books inside.
app_sentences.cn: 我的书包很重，因为里面有很多书。

data.meaning: 铅, 铅条, 领导, 超前量, 领引, 榜样, 主角, 导线

app_sentences.en: The old path will lead you to a beautiful small lake.
app_sentences.cn: 这条旧小路会引你到一个美丽的小湖。

app_sentences.en: The teacher asked a student to lead the group discussion.
app_sentences.cn: 老师让一个学生来引导小组讨论。

data.meaning: 同样地, 例如

app_sentences.en: As it is getting late, we should all go home now.
app_sentences.cn: 天色渐晚，我们现在都应该回家了。

app_sentences.en: As it is raining, we will have our PE class indoors today.
app_sentences.cn: 因为正在下雨，我们今天将在室内上体育课。

data.meaning: 食堂, 伙食, 用膳, 一份食品, 混乱, 乱七八糟, 困境

app_sentences.en: My brother's room is always a mess with toys everywhere.
app_sentences.cn: 我弟弟的房间总是一团糟，玩具到处都是。

data.meaning: 天堂, 上帝, 天空

app_sentences.en: The quiet beach was like heaven for us during the holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 那个安静的海滩在假期里对我们来说就像天堂一样。

data.meaning: 预期, 盼望, 期待

app_sentences.en: I expect to receive a good grade on my English test.
app_sentences.cn: 我期待英语考试能取得好成绩。

app_sentences.en: I expect to receive a birthday gift from my parents this year.
app_sentences.cn: 我期待今年能收到父母的一份生日礼物。

app_sentences.en: I expect to get a letter from my pen pal next week.
app_sentences.cn: 我期待下周能收到笔友的来信。

data.meaning: 艺术家, 画家

app_sentences.en: The young artist can draw beautiful pictures of nature.
app_sentences.cn: 那位年轻的艺术家能画出美丽的大自然图画。

data.meaning: 发明, 创作, 虚构

app_sentences.en: Thomas Edison worked hard to invent the light bulb.
app_sentences.cn: 托马斯·爱迪生努力发明了电灯泡。

data.meaning: 副本, 摹仿, 一册

app_sentences.en: Please do not copy your classmate's answers in the test.
app_sentences.cn: 考试时请不要抄袭你同学的答案。

data.meaning: 白纸黑字的, 黑白混合的

app_sentences.en: My grandfather likes to watch old black-and-white movies.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖父喜欢看老的黑白电影。

data.meaning: 自己的

app_sentences.en: My dream is to have my own room when I grow up.
app_sentences.cn: 我的梦想是长大后拥有自己的房间。

data.meaning: 私人的, 秘密的, 私立的, 隐蔽的

app_sentences.en: This diary is private, so please do not read it.
app_sentences.cn: 这本日记是私人的，所以请不要阅读。

data.meaning: 使满意, 满足, 符合, 使确信, 赔偿

app_sentences.en: The teacher's explanation did not satisfy my curiosity.
app_sentences.cn: 老师的解释没有满足我的好奇心。

data.meaning: 风扇, 迷, 狂热者, 爱好者

app_sentences.en: I am a big fan of this singer and have all her CDs.
app_sentences.cn: 我是这位歌手的超级粉丝，拥有她所有的CD。

data.meaning: 印, 邮票, 打印器, 戳子, 图章, 印花税票, 标志, 特征, 类型, 跺脚

app_sentences.en: My hobby is collecting stamps from different countries.
app_sentences.cn: 我的爱好是收集不同国家的邮票。

data.meaning: 整理

app_sentences.en: We need to tidy up our classroom before we go home.
app_sentences.cn: 我们需要在回家前把教室收拾整齐。

data.meaning: 架子, 搁板

app_sentences.en: Please put the book back on the shelf after you read it.
app_sentences.cn: 请你看完书后把它放回书架上。

app_sentences.en: Please put the dictionary back on the shelf after using it.
app_sentences.cn: 使用后请将字典放回书架上。

data.meaning: 看一看

app_sentences.en: Can I have a look at the photos you took during the trip?
app_sentences.cn: 我能看一看你在旅行期间拍的照片吗？

data.meaning: 硬币, 金钱, 货币

app_sentences.en: I found an old coin under my grandmother's sofa yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 我昨天在祖母的沙发下发现了一枚旧硬币。

data.meaning: 笔记, 记录, 注解, 票据, 符号, 显要, 注重, 便笺, 照会

app_sentences.en: I wrote a note to remind myself about the meeting after school.
app_sentences.cn: 我写了一张便条提醒自己放学后开会。

app_sentences.en: I left a note on the fridge to remind my brother about the meeting.
app_sentences.cn: 我在冰箱上留了张便条提醒我弟弟开会的事。

app_sentences.en: My mother left a note on the table to remind me.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈在桌子上留了张纸条提醒我。

data.meaning: 磅, 英镑, 重击, 鱼塘, 拘留所, 兽栏

app_sentences.en: I need to buy one pound of apples from the supermarket.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要从超市买一磅苹果。

app_sentences.en: This book costs five pounds at the bookstore.
app_sentences.cn: 这本书在书店卖五英镑。

data.meaning: 美元, 元(加、澳等国货币单位)

app_sentences.en: I saved ten dollars to buy a birthday present for my mom.
app_sentences.cn: 我省下了十美元给妈妈买生日礼物。

data.meaning: 必须, 未发酵葡萄汁, 绝对必要的事物

app_sentences.en: You must finish your homework before you watch TV.
app_sentences.cn: 你必须在看电视之前完成作业。

data.meaning: 有价值的, 贵重的, 宝贵的, 可估价的

app_sentences.en: Time is the most valuable thing we have in our lives.
app_sentences.cn: 时间是我们生命中最宝贵的东西。

data.meaning: 和...在一起, 以, 由于

app_sentences.en: I like to drink tea with a little sugar in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢早上喝加一点糖的茶。

data.meaning: 价值, 价格, 购买力, 评价, 估价, 计算结果

app_sentences.en: My grandmother taught me the value of being honest.
app_sentences.cn: 我的祖母教会了我诚实的价值。

data.meaning: 正直的, 合理的, 正确的, 应得的

app_sentences.en: I just finished my homework, so now I can watch TV.
app_sentences.cn: 我刚做完作业，所以现在可以看电视了。

app_sentences.en: I just finished reading an interesting book about space.
app_sentences.cn: 我刚读完一本关于太空的有趣的书。

data.meaning: 人, 人身, 人称

app_sentences.en: He is a very kind person and always helps others.
app_sentences.cn: 他是个非常善良的人，总是帮助别人。

data.meaning: 兴趣, 嗜好, 利息, 利益, 爱好, 趣味, 势力

app_sentences.en: My main interest is collecting stamps from different countries.
app_sentences.cn: 我的主要兴趣是收集来自不同国家的邮票。

app_sentences.en: My main interest is playing the piano after school.
app_sentences.cn: 我的主要兴趣是放学后弹钢琴。

data.meaning: 技术, 技巧, 技能, 熟练, 熟练工人

app_sentences.en: Learning a new language is a useful skill for everyone.
app_sentences.cn: 学习一门新语言对每个人来说都是一项有用的技能。

data.meaning: 活动, 行动, 活跃, 活力

app_sentences.en: Our favourite activity in the summer is swimming in the pool.
app_sentences.cn: 我们夏天最喜欢的活动是在游泳池里游泳。

data.meaning: 航行, 航海术, 启航

app_sentences.en: My uncle enjoys sailing on the lake during the weekends.
app_sentences.cn: 我的叔叔喜欢在周末去湖上航行。

data.meaning: 鼓励, 支持, 激励

app_sentences.en: My parents always encourage me to try my best in everything.
app_sentences.cn: 我的父母总是鼓励我在每件事上都尽力而为。

data.meaning: 到边远地区来, 出现, 露出, 出版, 罢工, 结果是, 褪去, 被解出, 宣布

app_sentences.en: The new magazine will come out in bookshops next Monday.
app_sentences.cn: 新杂志将于下周一在书店上架。

data.meaning: 结果, 成绩, 答案

app_sentences.en: If you study hard, you will get a good result in the exam.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你努力学习，你会在考试中取得好结果。

app_sentences.en: The result of the match made all the fans very happy.
app_sentences.cn: 比赛的结果让所有的球迷都非常高兴。

app_sentences.en: Hard work is often the result of good grades.
app_sentences.cn: 努力学习通常是好成绩的结果。

data.meaning: 结果

app_sentences.en: He studied very hard, and as a result, he passed the exam.
app_sentences.cn: 他学习非常努力，结果他通过了考试。

data.meaning: 快乐, 愉快, 令人高兴的事, 娱乐, 希望

app_sentences.en: It is a great pleasure to help my classmates with their studies.
app_sentences.cn: 帮助同学们学习是一件非常愉快的事。

data.meaning: 成功, 成就, 胜利

app_sentences.en: Hard work is often the key to success in school and in life.
app_sentences.cn: 努力通常是学校和生活中取得成功的关键。

app_sentences.en: Hard work is the key to success in any field.
app_sentences.cn: 努力工作是任何领域取得成功的关键。

data.meaning: 目录, 名单, 明细表, 布条, 条纹, 列表, 序列, 数据清单

app_sentences.en: I made a list of all the things I need for school tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 我列了一份明天上学所需所有物品的清单。

app_sentences.en: My mother made a shopping list before going to the supermarket.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈去超市前列了一张购物清单。

data.meaning: 开列；编

app_sentences.en: I need to make a list of things to do during the holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要列一份假期要做的事情的清单。

data.meaning: 发狂的, 狂热的

app_sentences.en: My friends think I am crazy to get up at 5 am for running.
app_sentences.cn: 我的朋友们认为我早上5点起床跑步是疯了。

data.meaning: 在…末尾,在…结束时

app_sentences.en: We have a big party at the end of the school year.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在学年末有一个盛大的聚会。

data.meaning: 短裤, (美)男人的短衬裤

app_sentences.en: I usually wear shorts when I play basketball in the summer.
app_sentences.cn: 我夏天打篮球时通常穿短裤。

data.meaning: 太阳镜, 墨镜, 太阳眼镜

app_sentences.en: You should wear sunglasses to protect your eyes on sunny days.
app_sentences.cn: 在阳光明媚的日子，你应该戴太阳镜来保护眼睛。

data.meaning: （在国外的访问者）在当地居民家居住的时期

app_sentences.en: I did a homestay with a friendly family in Australia last summer.
app_sentences.cn: 去年夏天我在澳大利亚一个友好的家庭寄宿。

data.meaning: 称...重量, 衡量, 把...压弯, 考虑, 权衡, 起锚

app_sentences.en: The doctor asked me to weigh myself every week.
app_sentences.cn: 医生要求我每周称体重。

data.meaning: 全体的, 总的, 全然的

app_sentences.en: The total number of students in our school is over a thousand.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校的学生总数超过一千人。

data.meaning: 重, 重量, 体重, 砝码, 重大, 影响, 力量

app_sentences.en: Eating healthy food helps me keep a good weight.
app_sentences.cn: 吃健康的食物有助于我保持良好的体重。

data.meaning: 护照, 手段, 通行证

app_sentences.en: You need a passport to travel to another country.
app_sentences.cn: 你需要护照才能去另一个国家旅行。

data.meaning: 文化, 修养, 耕种

app_sentences.en: We learn about different cultures in our geography and history classes.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在地理和历史课上学习不同的文化。

app_sentences.en: We learned about Japanese culture in our geography class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在地理课上学到了日本文化。

data.meaning: 同时, 但是

app_sentences.en: We cannot watch TV and do our homework at the same time.
app_sentences.cn: 我们不能同时看电视和做作业。

data.meaning: 最后的, 末尾的, 最近的

app_sentences.en: The science lesson lasted for two hours yesterday afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天下午的科学课持续了两个小时。

data.meaning: 靠, 视...而定, 信赖

app_sentences.en: Whether we go for a picnic depends on the weather tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 我们是否去野餐取决于明天的天气。

data.meaning: 依靠, 依赖

app_sentences.en: Your success depends on how hard you work every day.
app_sentences.cn: 你的成功取决于你每天有多努力。

data.meaning: 提供, 供应, 规定, 预备

app_sentences.en: The school library provides many interesting books for students.
app_sentences.cn: 学校图书馆为学生提供许多有趣的书籍。

data.meaning: 测试, 试验, 化验, 检验, 考验, 甲壳

app_sentences.en: We will have a vocabulary test in English class next Friday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们下周五英语课将有一次词汇测验。

data.meaning: 进步, 发展, 前进

app_sentences.en: My English teacher is happy with my progress this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我的英语老师对我这学期的进步感到高兴。

data.meaning: 客人, 来宾, 旅客

app_sentences.en: We prepared a nice meal for the guest from America.
app_sentences.cn: 我们为来自美国的客人准备了一顿美餐。

data.meaning: 日常生活; 起居

app_sentences.en: We use English in our daily life when we travel or use computers.
app_sentences.cn: 当我们旅行或使用电脑时，我们在日常生活中使用英语。

app_sentences.en: Mobile phones are important in our daily life now.
app_sentences.cn: 手机现在在我们的日常生活中很重要。

data.meaning: 形状, 形体, 类型, 方式, 表格, 形式

app_sentences.en: We need to fill in a form to join the school chess club.
app_sentences.cn: 我们需要填一张表格才能加入学校国际象棋俱乐部。

app_sentences.en: Please fill in this form with your name and address.
app_sentences.cn: 请在这张表格上填写你的姓名和地址。

app_sentences.en: Please fill in this form with your personal information.
app_sentences.cn: 请用你的个人信息填写这张表格。

data.meaning: 友谊, 友爱, 友善

app_sentences.en: Friendship between classmates is very important at school.
app_sentences.cn: 同学之间的友谊在学校里非常重要。

data.meaning: 比分咬得很紧

app_sentences.en: We promise to stay in touch after we go to different high schools.
app_sentences.cn: 我们承诺在去了不同的高中后保持联系。

data.meaning: 宁可, 较喜欢, 提出

app_sentences.en: I prefer tea to coffee because tea is more healthy.
app_sentences.cn: 比起咖啡，我更喜欢茶，因为茶更健康。

app_sentences.en: I prefer to ride my bicycle to school rather than take the bus.
app_sentences.cn: 我更喜欢骑自行车上学而不是乘公共汽车。

app_sentences.en: I prefer reading books to playing computer games.
app_sentences.cn: 与玩电脑游戏相比，我更喜欢看书。

data.meaning: 确定的, 某一个的, 必然的

app_sentences.en: I am certain that I locked the door when I left the house.
app_sentences.cn: 我确定我离开家时锁了门。

app_sentences.en: I am certain that I put my keys on the table this morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我确信我今天早上把钥匙放在桌子上了。

data.meaning: 装满, 填充, 弥漫, 供给, 满足, 供应

app_sentences.en: Please fill the bottle with water before we start the experiment.
app_sentences.cn: 我们开始实验前，请把瓶子装满水。

app_sentences.en: Can you help me fill this bottle with water, please?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我把这个瓶子装满水吗？

data.meaning: 填写, 使长大, 变大, 使长胖, 使完备

app_sentences.en: Every student needs to fill out this health form.
app_sentences.cn: 每个学生都需要填写这张健康表格。

data.meaning: 刚刚, 几乎不, 勉强是

app_sentences.en: I can hardly hear the teacher because the classroom is too noisy.
app_sentences.cn: 我几乎听不见老师说话，因为教室太吵了。

data.meaning: 拿起, 开始从事, 继续, 接纳, 吸收, 占据, 拘捕, 承兑, 认购, 绷紧

app_sentences.en: I want to take up a new hobby like painting this year.
app_sentences.cn: 今年我想开始一项新的爱好，比如绘画。

data.meaning: 指出

app_sentences.en: The teacher will point out our mistakes in the homework.
app_sentences.cn: 老师会指出我们作业中的错误。

app_sentences.en: The teacher pointed out several mistakes in my homework.
app_sentences.cn: 老师指出了我作业中的几个错误。

data.meaning: 风景, 名胜；视野（sight的复数）

app_sentences.en: We visited all the famous sights in the city during our trip.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在旅行期间参观了这座城市所有著名的景点。

data.meaning: 口渴的, 渴望的, 干燥的

app_sentences.en: After playing football, I feel very thirsty and need some water.
app_sentences.cn: 踢完足球后，我感到非常口渴，需要喝点水。

app_sentences.en: After playing basketball, I felt very thirsty and drank some water.
app_sentences.cn: 打完篮球后，我感到很口渴，喝了些水。

data.meaning: 在…顶部

app_sentences.en: There is a small flag at the top of the school building.
app_sentences.cn: 在学校楼的顶部有一面小旗子。

data.meaning: 浪费, 废物, 损耗, 消耗, 荒地, 垃圾, 地面风化物

app_sentences.en: Don't waste food. Remember many people in the world are hungry.
app_sentences.cn: 不要浪费食物。记住世界上很多人还在挨饿。

app_sentences.en: Do not waste water when you brush your teeth.
app_sentences.cn: 刷牙时不要浪费水。

app_sentences.en: Don't waste water when you brush your teeth.
app_sentences.cn: 刷牙时不要浪费水。

data.meaning: 正方形, 街区, 广场, 平方, 直角尺

app_sentences.en: There is a beautiful fountain in the town square.
app_sentences.cn: 镇广场上有一个美丽的喷泉。

data.meaning: 公里, 千米

app_sentences.en: My home is about two kilometres away from our school.
app_sentences.cn: 我家离学校大约两公里远。

data.meaning: 形状, 形态, 外形, 形式, 身材

app_sentences.en: The cookies are in the shape of stars and animals.
app_sentences.cn: 饼干是星星和动物的形状。

app_sentences.en: The shape of the moon changes every night.
app_sentences.cn: 月亮的形状每晚都在变化。

data.meaning: 人, 人类

app_sentences.en: Clean water and air are important for all human beings.
app_sentences.cn: 干净的水和空气对所有人类都很重要。

app_sentences.en: Water and air are important for all human life.
app_sentences.cn: 水和空气对所有人类生命都很重要。

data.meaning: 叫醒, 激发

app_sentences.en: I usually wake up at seven o'clock on school days.
app_sentences.cn: 上学日我通常七点醒来。

data.meaning: 的过去分词

app_sentences.en: I was woken by the sound of heavy rain this morning.
app_sentences.cn: 今天早上我被大雨的声音吵醒了。

app_sentences.en: My mother wakes me every morning for school.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈每天早晨叫醒我去上学。

data.meaning: 了不起的人, 大人物

app_sentences.en: Somebody left their umbrella in the classroom yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天有人把雨伞落在教室里了。

data.meaning: 在...周围, 大约, 有关, 关于

app_sentences.en: We read a story about a brave knight in English class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在英语课上读了一个关于勇敢骑士的故事。

data.meaning: 路径, 小路, 道路, 途径, 路线, 轨道

app_sentences.en: We walked along a narrow path through the forest.
app_sentences.cn: 我们沿着一条穿过森林的狭窄小路行走。

data.meaning: 拉, 拖, 拔, 牵, 撕开, 吸引

app_sentences.en: Please help me pull this heavy box to the corner of the room.
app_sentences.cn: 请帮我把这个重箱子拉到房间的角落。

app_sentences.en: Can you help me pull this heavy box to the corner?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我把这个沉重的箱子拉到角落去吗？

data.meaning: 江河湖泊的, 淡水的

app_sentences.en: We cannot drink seawater, but we need freshwater to live.
app_sentences.cn: 我们不能喝海水，但我们需要淡水才能生存。

data.meaning: 热线服务电话

app_sentences.en: If you have a problem, you can call the school helpline.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你有问题，可以拨打学校帮助热线。

data.meaning: 独立件, 抽印本

app_sentences.en: The teacher asked us to separate into groups of four.
app_sentences.cn: 老师要求我们分成四人小组。

data.meaning: 解释, 说明

app_sentences.en: Can you explain how to solve this maths problem to me?
app_sentences.cn: 你能给我解释一下如何解这道数学题吗？

app_sentences.en: Can you explain this math problem to me again, please?
app_sentences.cn: 你能再给我解释一下这道数学题吗？

data.meaning: 拒绝, 谢绝

app_sentences.en: I cannot refuse to help my friend when he is in trouble.
app_sentences.cn: 当我的朋友遇到困难时，我不能拒绝帮助他。

app_sentences.en: I had to refuse his invitation because I was too busy.
app_sentences.cn: 我不得不拒绝他的邀请，因为我太忙了。

data.meaning: 宴请, 款待

app_sentences.en: My father will treat us to dinner to celebrate my good marks.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸要请我们吃饭来庆祝我的好成绩。

app_sentences.en: My parents will treat me to dinner for my good grades.
app_sentences.cn: 我的父母会因为我的好成绩请我吃晚饭。

app_sentences.en: My father treated us to a big dinner for my good grades.
app_sentences.cn: 因为我成绩好，爸爸请我们吃了一顿大餐。

data.meaning: 她自己, 她亲自

app_sentences.en: She made the birthday cake all by herself.
app_sentences.cn: 她完全是自己做的生日蛋糕。

data.meaning: 是否, 不论

app_sentences.en: I am not sure whether it will rain tomorrow or not.
app_sentences.cn: 我不确定明天是否会下雨。

data.meaning: 孤单的, 孤寂的, 荒凉的

app_sentences.en: She felt a little lonely when she first came to this new school.
app_sentences.cn: 她刚来到这所新学校时感到有点孤独。

app_sentences.en: The old man felt lonely after his children moved away.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们搬走后，那位老人感到孤独。

data.meaning: 遗憾, 后悔, 悔恨, 抱歉, 歉意

app_sentences.en: If you don't study hard now, you will regret it in the future.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你现在不努力学习，将来你会后悔的。

app_sentences.en: I regret that I did not study harder for the test.
app_sentences.cn: 我后悔没有为那次测验更加努力地学习。

data.meaning: 病人, 承受者

app_sentences.en: A good teacher is always patient with students' questions.
app_sentences.cn: 一位好老师对学生的提问总是很耐心。

app_sentences.en: A good teacher is always patient with her students.
app_sentences.cn: 一位好老师对她的学生总是很有耐心。

data.meaning: 介绍, 引入, 采用, 输入

app_sentences.en: On the first day, the teacher asked us to introduce ourselves.
app_sentences.cn: 第一天，老师让我们做自我介绍。

app_sentences.en: Let me introduce my new classmate to all of you.
app_sentences.cn: 让我向你们大家介绍我的新同学。

data.meaning: 参加, 加入

app_sentences.en: All the students are welcome to join in the singing game.
app_sentences.cn: 欢迎所有学生参加这个唱歌游戏。

data.meaning: 不麻烦; 没什么; 没事儿; 非常容易

app_sentences.en: 'Can you help me with this question?' 'Sure, no problem.'
app_sentences.cn: '你能帮我解答这个问题吗？''当然，没问题。'

data.meaning: 沉默, 无声, 静寂, 湮没, 无声息

app_sentences.en: There was silence in the library when everyone was reading.
app_sentences.cn: 当每个人都在阅读时，图书馆里一片寂静。

data.meaning: 沉默着

app_sentences.en: We listened to the music in silence and enjoyed it.
app_sentences.cn: 我们静静地听着音乐，享受其中。

data.meaning: 经过, 要隘, 途径, 通行, 护照, 及格

app_sentences.en: I hope I can pass all my subjects this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望这学期我能通过所有科目。

app_sentences.en: Please pass the salt to me during dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 请吃饭时把盐递给我。

data.meaning: 明亮的, 聪明的, 鲜明的, 欢快的

app_sentences.en: The classroom is bright and clean with many windows.
app_sentences.cn: 教室有很多窗户，明亮又干净。

app_sentences.en: The sun is very bright today, so wear your hat.
app_sentences.cn: 今天太阳很亮，所以戴上你的帽子。

data.meaning: 宝物, 财富

app_sentences.en: We should treasure the time we spend with our family.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该珍惜与家人共度的时光。

data.meaning: 逐日

app_sentences.en: My English is improving day by day with more practice.
app_sentences.cn: 通过更多的练习，我的英语一天天在进步。

data.meaning: 信任, 信赖, 相信, 受托, 职责, 信心, 托拉斯

app_sentences.en: Good friends should always trust each other.
app_sentences.cn: 好朋友应该总是相互信任。

data.meaning: 包括, 把...算入, 包住

app_sentences.en: Does the price of the book include the delivery cost?
app_sentences.cn: 这本书的价格包括运费吗？

data.meaning: 圆周, 社交圈, 循环, 范围

app_sentences.en: We sat in a circle on the floor to play the game.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在地板上坐成一圈玩游戏。

app_sentences.en: The children sat in a circle and played a game.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们围坐成一个圆圈玩游戏。

data.meaning: 棍, 棒, 刺, 枯枝, 茎, 条状物

app_sentences.en: We use glue to stick the pictures onto the paper.
app_sentences.cn: 我们用胶水把图片粘到纸上。

data.meaning: 胶, 粘性物

app_sentences.en: Can I borrow your glue to fix my broken notebook?
app_sentences.cn: 我能借你的胶水来修补我破损的笔记本吗？

data.meaning: 提议, 意见

app_sentences.en: My teacher gave me a good suggestion about how to study.
app_sentences.cn: 我的老师给了我一个关于如何学习的好建议。

data.meaning: 主管, 导演, 董事

app_sentences.en: The director of the movie is very famous around the world.
app_sentences.cn: 这部电影的导演在世界各地都很有名。

data.meaning: 显示, 表现, 展览, 卖弄, 炫耀, 外观, 演出, 洋相

app_sentences.en: Can you show me how to solve this difficult problem?
app_sentences.cn: 你能教我怎么解这道难题吗？

data.meaning: 包围, 在...周围, 四处

app_sentences.en: We walked around the lake and enjoyed the beautiful view.
app_sentences.cn: 我们绕着湖散步，欣赏美丽的景色。

app_sentences.en: My father will show me how to ride a bike this weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸这个周末将教我如何骑自行车。

data.meaning: 插出

app_sentences.en: The radio station is on air from six in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 这个广播电台从早上六点开始播音。

data.meaning: 避免, 防止, 撤消

app_sentences.en: You should avoid making the same mistake next time.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该避免下次再犯同样的错误。

data.meaning: 背景, 背景资料

app_sentences.en: The background of the photo is a beautiful mountain.
app_sentences.cn: 这张照片的背景是一座美丽的山。

data.meaning: 国家的, 国立的, 全国性的, 民族的

app_sentences.en: The Great Wall is a famous national treasure of China.
app_sentences.cn: 长城是中国的著名国宝。

app_sentences.en: The National Day holiday is a happy time for our family.
app_sentences.cn: 国庆节假期对我们家来说是一段快乐的时光。

data.meaning: 国际的

app_sentences.en: We have an international food festival at our school every year.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校每年都有一个国际美食节。

app_sentences.en: English is an important international language.
app_sentences.cn: 英语是一门重要的国际语言。

data.meaning: 节目主持人, 奉献者, 提出者

app_sentences.en: The presenter on the TV show spoke very clearly.
app_sentences.cn: 电视节目上的主持人说话非常清晰。

data.meaning: 面谈, 访问, 接见, 面试

app_sentences.en: The reporter will interview some students about school life.
app_sentences.cn: 记者将采访一些学生关于学校生活的情况。

data.meaning: 象是, 似乎

app_sentences.en: You seem very happy today. Did something good happen?
app_sentences.cn: 你今天看起来很高兴。发生了什么好事吗？

data.meaning: 收听者, 听众

app_sentences.en: A good listener is important in a conversation.
app_sentences.cn: 在谈话中，一个好的倾听者很重要。

data.meaning: 亲自, 外貌上

app_sentences.en: I hope to meet my favourite writer in person one day.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望有一天能亲自见到我最喜欢的作家。

data.meaning: 兼任的, 半工半读的, 部分时间的

app_sentences.en: My brother has a part-time job in a supermarket.
app_sentences.cn: 我哥哥在一家超市有一份兼职工作。

data.meaning: 文章, 冠词, 物品, 物件, 条款, 契约

app_sentences.en: I read an interesting article about space in the magazine.
app_sentences.cn: 我在杂志上读到一篇关于太空的有趣文章。

data.meaning: 工作室, 画室, 演播室, 电影制片厂

app_sentences.en: The singer is recording a new song in the studio now.
app_sentences.cn: 那位歌手现在正在录音棚录制一首新歌。

data.meaning: 目的, 意向, 决心, 用途, 效果, 论题

app_sentences.en: The main purpose of this meeting is to plan the class trip.
app_sentences.cn: 这次会议的主要目的是计划班级旅行。

app_sentences.en: The main purpose of our meeting is to plan the class trip.
app_sentences.cn: 我们会议的主要目的是计划班级旅行。
